overview:
Apul Nahata is the Vice-President at TringMe. He brings in over 13 years of experience in application and embedded software design to TringMe. Prior to joining TringMe, he has held management and technical leadership roles at QUALCOMM Inc, Fujitsu Business Communication Systems etc. Most recently, he was leading the next generation UI design for mobile devices at QUALCOMM. While at QUALCOMM, he was also the technical lead for BREW (Binary Runtime Environment for Wireless) SDK.

He holds a M.S in computer science from USC, USA. Apul has filed multiple patents in areas of device simulation, telecom and application software. He has also actively contributed to Eudora Mail client.
